```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```
```{r}
nyoaa_df = read_csv("./Data/nynoaadat.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) %>% 
  filter(
    prcp != 0,
    snow != 0,
    snwd != 0
  )

set.seed(222)
random_nyoaa_df = nyoaa_df[sample(nrow(nyoaa_df), 1000),]
```
